Package RobotAssignment.copy

Class MrRobot

java.lang.Object
RobotAssignment.copy.MrRobot
public class MrRobot extends Object
Class MrRobot is a class to define a robot object with a name position and orientation.
Author:
johan

  • Constructor Details

    • MrRobot

      public MrRobot(String name, Posision position, Orientation orientation)
      MrRobot constructor sets MrRobot properties. Like name, position and orientation.
      Parameters:
      name - sets the name of the Robot
      position - sets the position of the robot
      orientation - the orientation of the robot

    • MrRobot

      public MrRobot(String defaultStr)
      MrRobot constructor which take over a string parameter. The string 'default' sets the robot object name to MrRobot and sets the position and orientation to 0 0 North.
      Parameters:
      defaultStr - string.equals("default") sets MrRobot object to default values. Anything else runs the setMrRobotName method and initialise MrRobot object which will ask for user input instead.
